channel.title: .MDL to .DAT Conversion
channel.description:
[b]Problem:[/b] I have all of the godwars objects, gfx's, NPC's etc as a .mdl file format and can not convert them via DATmaker. I open the file in DATmaker and all of the .mdl files show up but I can not view them as it says 'Invalid File Format' and also I can not click 'Make .dat' because it says 'No Model Data'. Would anyone know how to convert them into .dat file format?
[b]Reward:[/b] A blowjob. Or some rep, whatever floats your boat.

item.title: .MDL to .DAT Conversion
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Problem:
I have all of the godwars objects, gfx’s, NPC’s etc as a .mdl file format and can not convert them via DATmaker. I open the file in DATmaker and all of the .mdl files show up but I can not view them as it says ‘Invalid File Format’ and also I can not click ‘Make .dat’ because it says ‘No Model Data’. Would anyone know how to convert them into .dat file format?

Reward:
A blowjob. Or some rep, whatever floats your boat.
